<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Disarming Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=6263) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 187 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Bastion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=240)

**Prerequisites**
[Bastion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6262); Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

**Trigger**
You [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=5212) a melee [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) made with a held weapon.

</column>

---

With deft and practiced movement, you block at an angle to potentially dislodge the weapon. You attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=2383) the creature whose attack you blocked of the weapon they attacked you with. You can do so even if you don’t have a hand free.
name: Disarming Block
